    debug

    mixins

    maps

    Since 0.0.1
    @mixin maps() { ... }

    Description

    Prints into the console/terminal the maps that have been registered into the $maps map. Uses @debug to print the contents of the $maps map. If a list of keys with the names of registered maps is given, then only this information will get printed.

    Parameters

    None.

    Requires

    • [variable] maps

    See

    • [mixin] maps

    TODO's

    • Get nested maps

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor

    js

    mixins

    [private] _maps-to-json

    Since 1.0.0
    @mixin _maps-to-json() { ... }

    Description

    Description Private mixin used by export-to-json used to export a list of maps.

    Parameters

    None.

    Throws

    • Mixin export-to-json, expects the $maps list lenght to match the $map-names list length.

    Requires

    • [function] strip-unit
    • [variable] maps

    Used by

    • [mixin] export-to-json

    export-to-json

    Since 1.0.0
    @mixin export-to-json($maps) { ... }

    Description

    Description Exports a map or a list or a list of maps into JSON and attaches them to the body, via body::before->content. It does not accept nested maps. IMPORTANT: Requires the use of an element with an id of scss-vars, where the json string will be placed. Based on the code at: https://css-tricks.com/making-sass-talk-to-javascript-with-json/

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $maps

    A map where keys are the names of the properties and the values are a map for the property. I.e. $maps: ( colors: ( base:#000, white: #FFF ), breakpoints: ( sm: 480px, md: 1024px ) );

    		Map—none

    Requires

    • [mixin] _maps-to-json
    • [variable] maps

    ultraligero legacy

    functions

    cada_col

    @function cada_col($cuantas-cols:) { ... }

    Description

    Cuánto debe medir cada columna (unidad) Se usa -1 por la primer columna a la que se le quita el margen izquierdo

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $cuantas-cols:

    numero total de columnas

    		Number—none

    Returns

    Number —

    porcentaje del ancho de columnas

    Used by

    • [function] columns
    • [function] centered
    • [function] push_x

    Author

    • Roberto Palomino

    columns

    Description

    Se usa en el Loop para crear todos los tamaños de columnas ej. .grade-12.column

    numero de la columna que se especifica

    		Number—none

    Returns

    Number —

    porcentaje del ancho de la columna que se especifica

    Requires

    Author

    • Roberto Palomino

    mixins

    generador-de-columnas

    @mixin generador-de-columnas($name, $Number, $if) { ... }

    Description

    Automátically generates columns for a specific break.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $name

    of the break

    		String—none
    $Number

    of columns (equally sized)

    		Number—none
    $if

    columns are going to be called column or cuadro

    		String—none

    Throws

    • El tercer argumento de este mixin espera el string cuadro o el string columns, se ingreso: #{$cuadro_o_columns}

    Requires

    • [function] centered
    • [function] cuadros
    • [function] push_x

    Author

    • Roberto Palomino

    General

    variables

    debug

    Since 1.0.0
    $debug: true;

    Description

    Set to true to enable some or all of this functions

    Type

    Boolean

    Used by

    • [mixin] exports

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor

    breaks

    $breaks: (
	xs: 480px,
	sm: 768px,
	md: 1024px,
	lg: $container-max-width,
);

    Description

    A Map containing the breakpoints used for the project, as weel as for generating the grid classes. The responsive mixins (respond-to, biggerThan and smallerThan) accept either the map keys, strings and variables, so there is no need to reference the map keys in any special way.

    Example of their use in a mixin: @include smallerThan(medio) { //Your code }

    Type

    {map}

    Used by

    • [mixin] between
    • [mixin] over
    • [mixin] under

    maps

    Since 0.0.1;
    $maps: (	breaks: $breaks,
	colors: $colors,
	fonts: $fonts,
	spacings: $spacings
	);

    Example

    $maps:(breaks:$breaks, colors:$colors);

    Used by

    • [mixin] maps
    • [mixin] _maps-to-json
    • [mixin] export-to-json

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor

    fonts

    $fonts: (
	sans:	(sans-serif),
);

    Description

    Refer to font families through mapped variables. Font families must be written as lists, that is, between parenthesis.

    gutter-calculator

    @function gutter-calculator($gutter, $cols, $inner_or_outer) { ... }

    Description

    Returns the calculated value for a padding, depending if its an inner column, with padding-left and padding-right or an outer column with padding-right or padding-left only Note: use only for cases where you have more than 2 columns per row

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $gutter

    the gutter between columns

    		Unit—none
    $cols

    nomber of columns

    		Number—none
    $inner_or_outer

    either "inner" or "outer": if the value returned is for an 'inner' or 'outer' column

    		String—none

    Returns

    Unit —

    the corresponding value for the gutter

    Used by

    • [mixin] cuaternary-column-padding
    • [mixin] pentary-column-padding
    • [mixin] ternary-column-padding

    strip-unit

    Since 0.0.1

    Int or Float

    mixins

    aspect-ratio

    Since 1.0.0
    @mixin aspect-ratio($width, $height) { ... }

    Description

    Preserve aspect ratio of background image Apply the mixin to an element. A child container element wth the class &__aspect-ratio-container should be present.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $width

    Ratio number i.e(4)

    		Number—none
    $height

    Ratio number i.e(3)

    		Number—none

    between

    Since 1.0.0
    @mixin between($map, $map) { ... }

    Description

    An "@media" mixin that responds to a min and max screen width.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $map

    key or string $min Map with the names of breaks and their units or only the desired unit or the Map key.

    		—none
    $map

    key or string $max Map with the names of breaks and their units or only the desired unit or the Map key.

    		—none

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive).

    Requires

    • [variable] breaks

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor

    calc-col

    @mixin calc-col() { ... }

    Description

    Description Replicates the fluid percentual margins of "margin:0 auto" for a fixed width object, but allows for an offsetting in pixels or alignment of the element with regards to the center.

    Parameters

    None.

    Throws

    • Mixin calc-col

    • An error occured with mixin calc-col, $left-offset is not and percentage or could not be converted into one.

    Requires

    • [function] is-pixel

    center

    @mixin center($XYorXorY) { ... }

    Description

    Absolutetly centers an element inside another that contains it. The element will be centered "vertically and horizontally", "vertically", or "horizantally"

    Note that container element must have a position property different thatn "static".

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $XYorXorY

    String must be either 'xy' or 'y'. Else an error will be thrown.

    		String—none

    Throws

    • Argument in mixin

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $delimiter

    symbol

    		String—none
    $padding—noneList—none
    $top—noneNumber—none

    • Diego Villaseñor

    binary-cols

    Since 0.0.1
    @mixin binary-cols($sm:, $lg:) { ... }

    Description

    Calcula columnas binarias regulares y columnas binarias irregulares.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $sm:

    width de columna pequeña

    		Number—none
    $lg:

    width de columna

    		Number—none

    Example

    1-2 {@include binary-cols();} para columnas binarias regulares

    .col-1-2 {@include binary-cols(25, 100, 0, 125);} para columnas binarias irregulares

    Requires

    • [function] column_percentage

    Used by

    • [mixin] binary-column-maker

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor y Cecilia M. Borja

    binary-column-maker

    Since 0.0.1

    Description

    Combina dos mixins para crear columnas binarias regulares o irregulares

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $gutter:

    padding de la columna en px

    		Number—none

    Example

    1-2 {@include binary-column-maker($gutter:50px);}

    .col-1-2 {@include binary-column-maker(25, 50, 25px, 75);}

    • Diego Villaseñor y Cecilia M. Borja

    cuaternary-cols

    Since 0.0.1
    @mixin cuaternary-cols($sm:, $md:, $lg:) { ... }

    Description

    Calcula columnas ternarias y columnas ternarias irregulares.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $sm:

    width de columna pequeña

    		Number—none
    $md:

    width de columna mediana

    		Number—none
    $lg:

    width de columna grande

    		Number—none

    Example

    1-3 {@include ternary-cols();} para columnas ternarias regulares

    .col-1-3 {@include ternary-cols(25, 100, 25, 0);} para columnas ternarias irregulares

    Requires

    • [function] column_percentage

    Used by

    • [mixin] cuaternary-column-maker

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor y Cecilia M. Borja

    cuaternary-column-maker

    Since 0.0.1
    @mixin cuaternary-column-maker($gutter:) { ... }

    Description

    Combina dos mixins para crear columnas ternarias regulares o irregulares

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $gutter:

    padding de la columna

    		Number—none

    Example

    1-3 {@include ternary-column-maker(50px);}

    .col-1-3 {@include binary-column-maker(25, 50, 25, 25px, 100);}

    Requires

    • [mixin] cuaternary-cols
    • [mixin] cuaternary-column-padding

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor y Cecilia M. Borja

    cuaternary-column-padding

    Since 0.0.1
    @mixin cuaternary-column-padding($gutter:) { ... }

    Description

    Crea 3 paddings, 1 para cada elemento ABA padding distriuido proporcionalmente: El padding total que tiene A y que tiene B deben ser iguales A p_total = padA = 1 padding B p_total = padB = 2 paddings, B tiene padding derecha e izquierda Si: 50/3 = 16.666666 padA = 1 16.666666 padB = 2 16.666666

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $gutter:

    padding de la columna

    		Number—none

    Example

    1-3 {@include ternary-column-padding(50px);}

    Requires

    • [function] gutter-calculator

    Used by

    • [mixin] cuaternary-column-maker

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor y Cecilia M. Borja

    Description

    Crea

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $static_col_width—noneUnit—none
    $static_col_name

    nombre opcional

    		String—none
    $calc_col_name

    nombre opcional

    		String—none

    pentary-cols

    Since 0.0.1
    @mixin pentary-cols($sm:, $md:, $lg:) { ... }

    Description

    Calcula columnas pentarias y columnas pentarias irregulares.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $sm:

    width de columna pequeña

    		Number—none
    $md:

    width de columna mediana

    		Number—none
    $lg:

    width de columna grande

    		Number—none

    Example

    1-5 {@include pentary-cols();} para columnas pentarias regulares

    .col-1-5 {@include pentary-cols(25, 100, 25, 0);} para columnas pentarias irregulares

    Requires

    • [function] column_percentage

    Used by

    • [mixin] pentary-column-maker

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor y Cecilia M. Borja

    pentary-column-maker

    Since 0.0.1
    @mixin pentary-column-maker($gutter:) { ... }

    Description

    Combina dos mixins para crear columnas pentarias (5) regulares o irregulares

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $gutter:

    padding de la columna

    		Number—none

    Example

    1-3 {@include ternary-column-maker(50px);}

    .col-1-3 {@include binary-column-maker(25, 50, 25, 25px, 100);}

    Requires

    • [mixin] pentary-cols

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor y Cecilia M. Borja

    clearfix

    @mixin clearfix() { ... }

    Description

    For modern browsers

    1. The space content is one way to avoid an Opera bug when the contenteditable attribute is included anywhere else in the document. Otherwise it causes space to appear at the top and bottom of elements that are clearfixed.

    2. The use of table rather than block is only necessary if using :before to contain the top-margins of child elements.

      @author Nicolas Gallagher @link http://nicolasgallagher.com/micro-clearfix-hack/

    Parameters

    None.

    custom-appearance

    @mixin custom-appearance($boolean) { ... }

    Description

    Set to true for -webkit-,-moz-appereance:none useful for editing radio buttons among other things

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $boolean—noneBoolean—none

    placeholder

    Since 1.0.0
    @mixin placeholder($color) { ... }

    Description

    Sets the color for a plahceholder

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $color—noneString—none

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive).

    TODO's

    • Add @content capabilities

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor

    [private] _make-transitions

    Since 1.0.6
    @mixin _make-transitions($selector_type, $prop, $delay) { ... }

    Description

    Private mixin for the make transition factories, use those instead.

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $selector_type

    '%', '.' or '#'

    		String—none
    $prop

    defaults to all

    		String—none
    $delay

    defaults 0s

    		String—none

    Used by

    • [mixin] make-extendable-transitions
    • [mixin] make-transitions

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor adn Ceci M. Borja

    make-extendable-transitions

    Since 1.0.6
    @mixin make-extendable-transitions($prop, $delay) { ... }

    Description

    Transition factory, makes transition placeholders using a $transition-speeds map. The output class are .transition-#{$speed} and %transition-#{$speed}

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $prop

    defaults to all

    		String—none
    $delay

    defaults 0s

    		String—none

    Requires

    • [mixin] _make-transitions

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor adn Ceci M. Borja

    make-transitions

    Since 1.0.6
    @mixin make-transitions($prop, $delay) { ... }

    Description

    Transition factory, makes transition helper classes using a $transition-speeds map. The output class are .transition-#{$speed} and %transition-#{$speed}

    Parameters

    parameterNameparameterDescriptionparameterTypeparameterDefault value
    $prop

    defaults to all

    		String—none
    $delay

    defaults 0s

    		String—none

    Requires

    • [mixin] _make-transitions

    Author

    • Diego Villaseñor adn Ceci M. Borja
